images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of ScreenCoder.Given UI screenshots or design sketches as input, the Grounding Agent first detects and labels key components (e.g., header, navbar, sidebar, content). The Planning Agent organizes these components into a hierarchical layout using front-end engineering priors. The Generation Agent synthesizes initial HTML code with placeholders, followed by content mapping to produce the final webpage and code.

header: 4Enhancing VLMs with Scalable Data Generation and Dual-Stage Post-Training

images.caption: Figure 2:Qualitative example of the UI-to-code pipeline, showcasing VLM-generated functional partitions, hierarchical layout treeTTitalic_T, and front-end code generation.
